values: A Methodist Walks into a Reformed Church | Pr Mark Winter

Pastor Jeffery talks with Pastor Mark Winter about his experiences as a Methodist Minister visiting All Saints in recent months. They discuss worship, liturgy, hospitality, community life, relationships, children, doctrine, deep conversations, and other topics.
